row.Project: the name of the project where the bug exist
row.Application_component: part or function of the project where the bug is located
row.Version_number: software version number in which the error occurs
row.Author: bug reporter
row.Environment: under what conditions was the bug found
row.Playback_steps: sequence of actions to reproduce the bug
row.Actual_result: the result to which the playback of the steps leads
row.Expected_result: the result to which the playback of steps should lead
